modules.description: Implements DNS-based SPF record retrieval and validation for email origin verification. Uses a DNS client to query SPF records and evaluates them against a given context, returning validation results asynchronously. Useful in email servers to authenticate sender domains according to SPF policies.

This module provides DNS-based SPF validation for email origin verification. It asynchronously queries SPF records using a DNS client and evaluates them against a provided context to authenticate sender domains. Key operations include retrieving SPF records, validating email origins, and returning detailed validation results. For example, it can verify whether an email from a given domain complies with its SPF policy, helping prevent spoofing in email servers.
